Class ValidationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.utils.ValidationUtils
public class ValidationUtils extends Object
Utility class for input validation. Provides methods to validate user inputs.

    • isStrongPassword

      public static boolean isStrongPassword(String password)
      Validates password strength. Password must be at least 8 characters, contain uppercase, lowercase, and a number.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if password meets all requirements

    • getPasswordRequirements

      Returns:
      Password requirements description

      Returns:
      Error message or null if valid
